data.question: What is the empirical formula of the lanthanide coordination polymers synthesized from Ln(NO3)3 and H2PDA under hydrothermal conditions?
What property of [Er2(PDA)3(H2O)]·2H2O is demonstrated by its ability to adsorb water vapor?
Is the coordination geometry around Er1 in [Er2(PDA)3(H2O)]·2H2O described as a tricapped trigonal prism?
What happens to [Er2(PDA)3(H2O)]·2H2O when it is evacuated at room temperature?
data.answer: It loses the guest water molecules, forming [Er2(PDA)3(H2O)]

data.question: What is the effective pore window size estimated for [Er2(PDA)3]?
Does [Er2(PDA)3] show nonporous behavior toward Ar or N2?
What is the main interaction between [Er2(PDA)3] and CO2?
Is the dehydration and rehydration process of [Er2(PDA)3(H2O)]·2H2O reversible?
What is the isosteric heat of adsorption of CO2 at 273 K for [Er2(PDA)3]?
Does the adsorption isotherm of CO2 for [Er2(PDA)3] exhibit a hysteresis loop?
What is the main reason for the selectivity of [Er2(PDA)3] for CO2 over Ar?
data.answer: Combined differentiations on size and on host−guest interactions

data.question: Is the framework of [Er2(PDA)3] stable up to 450 °C?
What is the pore volume of [Er2(PDA)3] as calculated from the Dubinin−Radushkevitch equation?
Does the removal of both guest and coordinated water molecules from [Er2(PDA)3(H2O)]·2H2O result in a loss of crystalline order?
What is the main cause of hysteresis in the adsorption/desorption isotherms of [Er2(PDA)3]?
data.answer: Hindered diffusion of CO2 molecules in the pores

data.question: Are the lanthanide coordination polymers synthesized in this study insoluble in water?
What is the crystal system of [La2(PDA)3(H2O)]·2H2O?
What is the role of 1,4-phenylendiacetic acid in the synthesis of the lanthanide coordination polymers?
data.answer: It acts as a ligand material to support metal-organic frameworks

data.question: Can [Er2(PDA)3] adsorb N2 at 300 K?
What is the main focus of the study presented in the article?
data.answer: Investigating the synthesis, characterization, and gas adsorption properties of porous lanthanide-organic frameworks
